channel.title: MatthieuRolland on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in MatthieuRolland on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Introduction to Symfony multistore configuration forms
item.description: With the release of PrestaShop 1.7.8, we expanded PrestaShop multistore capabilities to Symfony forms in order to build a reusable form component to make configuration forms multishop-compatible.
